system_agents.name: Master Orchestrator Agent
system_agents.desc: DNA_Splicer.py — lets Anima combine traits from 2 agents to form new species

cybersecurity.name: Firewall Agent
cybersecurity.desc: Monitors and filters incoming/outgoing network traffic based on security rules.

cybersecurity.name: Intrusion Detection Agent
cybersecurity.desc: Detects unauthorized intrusion attempts or suspicious activities in the system.

threat_defense.name: Threat Intelligence Agent
threat_defense.desc: Gathers threat intelligence from external feeds and reports new vulnerabilities or attack patterns.

threat_defense.name: DDOS Defense Agent
threat_defense.desc: Detects and mitigates distributed denial-of-service attacks in real-time.

dark_web_monitoring.name: Dark Web Scanner Agent
dark_web_monitoring.desc: Scans dark web forums and marketplaces for mentions of the user’s data or assets.

dark_web_monitoring.name: Credential Leak Agent
dark_web_monitoring.desc: Detects if user credentials or sensitive data appear in data breaches or dark web dumps.

personal_exploration.name: Journal Analyzer Agent
personal_exploration.desc: Analyzes personal journal or diary entries to find patterns and insights about the user’s thoughts.

personal_exploration.name: Mood Tracker Agent
personal_exploration.desc: Tracks the user’s mood over time through interactions and inputs, providing feedback or visualizations.

adult.name: Romantic Companion Agent
adult.desc: Engages in flirtatious, romantic conversations with the user in a respectful and consensual manner.

adult.name: Erotic Storyteller Agent
adult.desc: Generates erotic or intimate stories and fantasies for the user, within agreed boundaries.

sentient_orchestration.name: Master Orchestrator Agent
sentient_orchestration.desc: Oversees and coordinates all other agents, ensuring they work together towards system goals.

sentient_orchestration.name: Context Manager Agent
sentient_orchestration.desc: Manages shared context and information between agents to keep knowledge consistent.

xperience_ai.name: VR Experience Agent
xperience_ai.desc: Creates immersive VR/AR experiences for the user by integrating with virtual environment hardware or simulations.

xperience_ai.name: Dream Weaver Agent
xperience_ai.desc: Generates guided dream-like scenarios or visualizations to help the user with creativity or relaxation.

xperience_ai.name: Sentient Narrator Agent
xperience_ai.desc: Narrates the user’s experiences or daily events in a storytelling style to provide insight or entertainment.

xperience_ai.name: Empathy Simulator Agent
xperience_ai.desc: Simulates scenarios that help the user experience perspectives of others, building empathy through role-play.

xperience_ai.name: Sensory Adapter Agent
xperience_ai.desc: Adjusts connected devices (lighting, music) in real time to enhance the user’s current experience or mood.

xperience_ai.name: Memory Replay Agent
xperience_ai.desc: Recreates important personal memories with rich detail for the user to re-experience them vividly.

xperience_ai.name: Lucid Dream Agent
xperience_ai.desc: Assists the user in practicing lucid dreaming techniques by providing prompts and tracking dream logs.

xperience_ai.name: Hyper Reality Agent
xperience_ai.desc: Blends real data and fictional elements to create an enhanced narrative of the user’s real-world environment.

xperience_ai.name: Experimentation Lab Agent
xperience_ai.desc: Tests experimental AI algorithms or experiences in a sandboxed way before they are deployed widely.

xperience_ai.name: Sensory Recorder Agent
xperience_ai.desc: Records multi-sensory data of the user’s experiences (with consent) to play back or analyze later.

data_analysis.name: Data Cleanup Agent
data_analysis.desc: Cleans and preprocesses datasets to remove inconsistencies, missing values, or noise.

communication.name: Email Agent
communication.desc: Sends, receives, and filters emails, alerting the user to important messages and filtering spam.

creative_content.name: Story Writer Agent
creative_content.desc: Writes short stories or narrative content based on prompts or user preferences.

personal_management.name: Task Scheduler Agent
personal_management.desc: Keeps track of tasks and deadlines, sending reminders and auto-scheduling where possible.

system_monitoring.name: CPU Monitor Agent
system_monitoring.desc: Monitors CPU usage and process activity, alerting if usage is abnormally high or suspicious.

integration.name: API Connector Agent
integration.desc: Connects to external APIs securely, handling authentication and data retrieval or posting.

healthcare.name: Health Monitor Agent
healthcare.desc: Monitors health vitals from wearable devices or user input, tracking heart rate, blood pressure, etc.

education.name: Tutor Agent
education.desc: Provides teaching sessions on various topics, explaining concepts and answering questions like a tutor.
